name: Draw Puzzle (itch)
description:
Draw puzzle is a casual puzzle game that is relaxing and challenging. Solving the puzzle by connecting squares with the same color and number to unlock pixel art. There are a variety of game modes in the game, different game modes bring different experiences. The game comes with its own editor, you will be able to create your own pixel art, generate puzzles and share with other players on Steam Workshop! The rules of connecting squares are inspired by an article in a Japanese magazine in the early days.

Features

  • Fun and cute pixel art puzzles
  • Normal mode - consisting of 100 puzzles from 5x5 to 25x25
  • Jigsaw mode - a fun large puzzle consisting of 24 smaller puzzles
  • Challenge mode - includes combo score system, Steam Leader boards.
  • Random mode - a puzzle generated randomly by the game
  • Level editor - edit your own level, support import and export images
  • No DLCs - enjoy new levels or game modes in future updates, all for free

The full version will be released on early August.

If you draw some awesome art by using the level editor and want to put it into the game, please contact us : info@indienova.com
